major_asset_group.desc: Broad category of assets that asset belongs to

major_industry.desc: Broad industry category that industry belongs to

GDS Class Life.desc: General Depreciation System life of asset

GDS Life.desc: General Depreciation System life of asset

ADS Life.desc: Alternative Depreciation System life of asset

System.desc: Current law depreciation system used for asset

Method.desc: Current law method of depreciation used (Straight line (SL), 200% declining balance, etc.)

delta.desc: Annual rate of economic depreciation of asset
